Now:
DATG Specialist



I am currently a Specialist with the Disney|ABC Television Group, making sure video and images show up where they should in all the Disney and ABC streaming apps.

In a former life, I was a Basic Cable Micro Celebrity™, a carpenter and host for HGTV and TLC, a custom furniture shop owner, and a union stagehand. Nerdery is my passion and hobby.


This page is for identity and linking to things I do on the internet. For regularly updated info, check out my blog, Cocktails & Coffee, or follow me on the social things. Links for my social activities are at the bottom of this page.

Now:
DATG Specialist

The Disney-ABC Television Group controls the streaming media apps for Disney Channel, Disney XD, Disney Junior, Freeform, and ABC. We have apps for iOS, Android, Roku, FireTV, AppleTV, tvOS, and Xbox.

Previously:
Bug Dog Studios, LLC

fine carpentry, furniture, and other entertaining things. Bug Dog Studios, LLC was a Brooklyn-based shop that specialized in custom cabinetry and small-space storage solutions, as well as project management and construction for fast-paced television home makeovers. With my company, I managed projects and built amazing things for over 300 episodes of television on TLC, HGTV, DIY, Fine Living, Food Network, FYI, and more.

The TV Years

From 2003 - 2014, I made much of my living building and project managing for home makeover television shows. I was happy to call HGTV my home for the majority of my tv career, but I also worked for TLC, Fine Living, Cooking, fyi, Style, and DIY.

Networks

My work can be seen on several cable networks, as well as in the homes of countless private clients in New York City.
